channel.title: Help would be nice thanks
channel.description:
How do i make a readable book in pi base. Like i want to make a request gamebook button and it shows all the Rules and stuff and i was wondering how do i make that? I've seen a book reading tut at moparscape / rune-server but that was a different base.
+
How do i make so a npc teleport you to places, like a guide. With that i mean, when we click on him, he will teleport to places and show us places in game ( we can't teleport or walk )
and when we done he teleport us back.
Thanks. ;D

item.title: Help would be nice thanks
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“fifififi, post:1, topic:432203”]How do i make a readable book in pi base. Like i want to make a request gamebook button and it shows all the Rules and stuff and i was wondering how do i make that? I’ve seen a book reading tut at moparscape / rune-server but that was a different base.

How do i make so a npc teleport you to places, like a guide.
With that i mean, when we click on him, he will teleport to places and show us places in game ( we can’t teleport or walk )

and when we done he teleport us back.

Thanks. ;D[/quote]

  1. In your item method (clicking an item ingame) add the method where you an interface will open.

sendInterface(141); sendQuest("hello", 145); //title
And so on. (the above code won’t work)

  1. In your first click npc file add something like

if(NPCID == 1) { toX = coords; toY = coords; }
This method will tele you to a certain place. Add a dialogue with it and add something like
Walking = false;

Read full topic
